thread.title: Otago Lotto player scores $18 million prize - Yahoo New Zealand
thread.title_full: Otago Lotto player scores $18 million prize - Yahoo New Zealand

author: Yahoo New Zealand On February
title: Otago Lotto player scores $18 million prize - Yahoo New Zealand
text:
Otago Lotto player scores $18 million prize - Yahoo New Zealand A Lotto player from Otago is $18 million richer after striking the big one. Close Powerball winner reaches agreement with co-workers who claim they were robbed of winnings UP NEXT VIDEO Powerball winner reaches agreement with co-workers who claim they were robbed of winnings. Source: 7 News Powerball winner reaches agreement with co-workers who claim they were robbed of winnings 
Saturday night's big win comes just days after a Lotto player in south Auckland became a millionaire. 
Wednesday's winner secured up $1 million. Tonight's winning Lotto numbers are 17, 2, 16, 39, 38, 3. Bonus ball 31 and Powerball 2. Good luck! — Lotto New Zealand (@Lotto_NZ) February 4, 2017 
Saturday's winning ticket was sold online via MyLotto, with the prize being made up of $18 million from the Powerball first division and an extra $250,000 from Lotto First Division. 
The win is the first Powerball win of 2017. 
Three other players are also in the money after winning $250,000 each. Photos: SNPA/Lotto NZ 
Tickets that also won were sold at Feilding Video Centre in Feilding, Tony's Stationery and Lotto in Maungaturoto and on MyLotto to a player from New Plymouth. 
Lotto's biggest ever prize – a cool $44 million – was won in Aucland when it was drawn on November 10, 2016. 
A young couple from the Hisbiscus Coast were the lucky winners. 
FIND out what people are saying about this story on our Facebook page .
